resources.string:
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 227.9 million km (1.52 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.0933
 **Orbital period:** 686.971 days
 **Average orbital speed:** 24.077 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 1.850°
 **Satellites:** 2
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 3,396.2 km (0.533 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 0.00589
 **Volume:** 1.6318×10^^11^^ km³ (0.151 Earths)
 **Mass:** 6.4185×10^^23^^ kg (0.107 Earths)
 **Mean density:** 3.9335 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 3.711 m/s² (0.376 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 5.027 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 24h 37m 22s
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 868.2 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 25.19°
 **Bond Albedo:** 0.25
 **Surface temperature:** −87°C to 20°C
==Atmosphere== **Surface pressure:** 0.636 (0.4–0.87) kPa
 **Composition:**
 95.3% carbon dioxide
 2.7% nitrogen
 1.6% argon
 0.13% oxygen
 0.08% carbon monoxide
 210 ppm water vapor
 100 ppm nitric oxide
 15 ppm molecular hydrogen
 2.5 ppm neon
 Trace amounts of HDO, krypton, formaldehyde, xenon, ozone, hydrogen peroxide, methane.


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mars|wikipedia]].
